text:
Cornerstone OnDemand | Santa Monica, CA | ONSITE | Full-time

Cornerstone OnDemand helps organizations to recruit, train and manage their people. We work with hundreds of the world’s largest companies—from Walgreens and Starwood Hotels & Resorts to Deutsche Post DHL and Xerox—and thousands of smaller ones to help them engage their workforces and empower their people. Our software impacts every aspect of the employee experience, helping people to make their best work even better – which ultimately translates into greater business results.

Tech: AWS, C#/.NET Core, React, Typescript, Node.js

https://cornerstone.csod.com/ux/ats/careersite/14/home?c=cor...
